Name: Shadow of the Far Sea
Description: An epic weapon in the Stormblade. Forged by upgrading <color=#ef8e60>Thunder Blade</color>, this weapon can be further enhanced in future seasons using a small amount of Glinting Stellar Core.
Description2:
"In the dark of night, tides surge like a silent blade slicing through the deep.
Lightning cleaves the waves, leaving behind traces that vanish in an instant.
The scythe dances with the wind. What it reaps is not just mortal bodies, but the rifts of fate.
Each strike is a judgment jointly issued by the sea and storm.
And the echo that remains is but solemn silence within shattered tides."
(Excerpt from "Book of the Depths VII")
